content.text: Match ends, Borussia Mönchengladbach 1, Manchester City 1.
Second Half ends, Borussia Mönchengladbach 1, Manchester City 1.
Offside, Manchester City. Sergio Agüero tries a through ball, but David Silva is caught offside.
Attempt missed. Nicolás Otamendi (Manchester City) header from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by David Silva with a cross following a corner.
